title: Spec Graph Index
description: Entry-point index for a Spec Graph. Lists all nodes and their file paths. Edges are defined inside each node file.

$schema.description: Path or URL to this schema for editor validation.

specgraphVersion.description: Spec Graph schema version for this graph.

root.description: Optional root node ID (commonly a feature or equivalence_contract node).

nodeSearchPaths.description: Optional additional directories to scan for nodes.

nodes.description: Canonical list of nodes and their file paths (relative to graph.json).

defaultNodeStatus.description: Default status assigned to new nodes.

relativePath.description: Relative POSIX-style path. No absolute paths or parent traversal.

id.description: Node ID (must match the node file's id field).

path.description: Relative path to the node file.

sha256.description: Optional content hash for tamper detection.

expectedType.description: Optional expected node type for quick validation.
